Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Polenta \Po*len"ta\, n. [It., fr. L. polenta peeled barley.] Pudding made of Indian meal; also, porridge made of chestnut meal. [Italy] [1913 Webster]
polenta n : a thick mush made of cornmeal boiled in stock or water
